name: Jane Doe
description: Jane has been working as a Financial Analyst at D3 Company for 3 years now. She quickly became an integral part of the team. In her free time, Jane enjoys trying out new brunch spots and going for walks with her dog, Pug.

name: John Smith
description: Since obtaining his CPHR certification, John has been working as a HR Coordinator at D3 Company. His efforts have helped the company's hiring process tremendously by streamlining efficency and helping pick out the best of the best candidates. Outside of work, John is an avid tennis player and enjoys watching his favourite baseball team, the Seattle Mariners.

name: Wendy Lee
description: Wendy has been with the D3 Company since its inception. She plays an integral role in ensuring that all office operations and administration are working smoothly. In her free time, Wendy enjoys going to different coffee shops and catching up on reading.
